features: 👍【Premium Quality Material】Our gauze bandage rolls are made of soft, non-stick and super absorbent materials, which are breathable and can be removed painlessly. Even for delicate skin, there is no irritation. Suitable for cleaning, preparation, packaging, dressing and debridement of wounds.

🎁【Individually packed】The individually packaged 30 packs gauze roll with 6 Medical Tapes is a perfect complement to the first aid kit and home wound care products. Each roll is 4 inches x 4.1 yards, which can be cut as needed. And is easy to store and carry.

🛡️【Easy to use and remove】Due to the use of high-grade cotton elastic material, our gauze roll is easier to use than traditional gauze roll, and it can be used for lint-free dressing change. Secure the loose end with the attached medical tape roll.

🧰【Essential for First Aid Kit】Our gauze roll is very suitable for dressing all kinds of wounds and is a must-have for your first aid kit; Such as minor wounds, cuts, abrasions, minor burns, ulcers, applying ointment or preparing needles, etc.
💛【Ensure Satisfaction】If you have any questions, please contact me on Amazon, we will reply you within 24 hours and give you a satisfactory solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: 30 Pack Gauze Rolls 4 in x 4.1yd each

AZEN disposable elastic gauze is suitable for dressing, hemostasis, fracture fixation and wound wrapping. It has very good water absorption, air permeability and elasticity. Non-toxic and tasteless, and does not irritate the skin.

Suitable for the Following Situations Family First Aid It is recommended that every family keep at least 10 rolls of gauze as an essential product of family medical kit. Surgery After-care It has very good water absorption, air permeability and elasticity. Non-toxic and tasteless, and does not irritate the skin. Pet Treat and Cure Suitable for dressing and fixing wounds of pets, and the material is friendly to pets. Of course, this will sometimes become the toy for dogs. Halloween Costume It can be used as a costume collocation to show personality and fashion, and also as a prop for mummies and characters.

What's in the package? 30 individually packing gauze rolls, 6 medical tapes, 1 pair of child safety scissors. Can this gauze be used to wrap the wound surface? This gauze is not a band-aid, so direct contact with the wound surface is not recommended, which may cause cotton yarn to adhere to the wound. The correct way is to cover the wound surface with band-aid or medicine first, and then wrap it with gauze. Will it cause rashes and allergies? Our gauze is non-toxic, tasteless, chemical-free and latex-free. Does not cause rashes and allergies. Is the length of gauze really 4.1 yards? The unified specification of the industry is: the length after pulling is measured as the length of gauze. The length of our gauze can reach 4.5 yards after being pulled up. Is this sterile gauze? No, this is not sterile gauze. These gauze are produced and packed in a dust-free environment. They are clean enough, but they are not sterile.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 11, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Daily dressing chages
reviews.reviewText: If you're doing daily dressing changes or just need something to hold something in place, these are great. They are not the 6 ply stuff you get from the hospitals, but WAY cheaper. When we needed that extra absorption, we just use two. They are a good width to cover larger areas... we were doing daily dressing changes on a small child's thigh... These worked well. I do recommend though not putting them directly on an open wound or the healing process may grow through the fabric. We used adaptic, and extra square gauze pieces when the wound was weeping more. We still use adaptic in some of the smaller open areas, but no longer have to add extra guaze. This product is very good to use, provides some streach, and covers a large amount. Good Luck!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Is what it is
reviews.reviewText: You get exactly what’s described and at more bang for your buck. A must have for any home first aid kit which is why I bought it. Each roll is individually wrapped. They seem a bit light on material but work perfect. The length is good so they make a great outer wrap for an Israeli bandage. Good purchase at a great price

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I had a medical issue. I went through a lot of this product. Now understand I was dealing with the insurance company and whom they approved. I got enough of these for 2 weeks and one other product. That their company wanted me to pay $700. Well, I don't take being screwed. I came here and looked at the same products and was very happy to find the same products and my cost was nothing like that. I got several months of wraps for less than that deal. I have found a lot of things for my health and not an insurance scam. Thank you Amazon

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 21, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars clean but not sterile
reviews.reviewText: I didn't read closely enough to discover that these bandages are not sterile. My bad. They are clean and will be good for an outer wrapping on top of a sterile bandage. Thankfully, I have some sterile bandages to put directly onto a wound.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very good quality product. each roll is wrapped in foil, which means it is sterile protected. Additionally, scissors and plasters are included.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 13, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Hard to open
reviews.reviewText: These are nice little gauze wraps and each one is sealed in plastic separately which proved nearly impossible to open and then they also include little rounds of - I am assuming is medical tape to help tape down the edges when you’re done with the bandaging- but once again -cannot get it off the roll.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Tightly individually wrapped
reviews.reviewText: They don't take up a lot of space in my kit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 24, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I needed to stock up on supplies. I found these at a great price. They are just like the ones you get at CVS and Walgreens but a whole lot cheaper.
